profile.title: PROFILE
profile.content: Experienced DevOps Engineer with expertise in Azure and AWS cloud platforms. Certified Azure DevOps Engineer Expert (AZ-400) and Azure Developer (AZ-204) with proven track record in designing and implementing scalable CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, and infrastructure automation. Passionate about building resilient cloud architectures and optimizing development workflows for enterprise-scale organizations.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Full-time DevOps engineering with expertise in Azure stack for international organization
Azure DevOps administrator managing 2000+ repositories and enterprise-scale CI/CD operations
Created custom tasks and extensions for internal CI/CD monitoring and SOX compliance
Designed comprehensive CI/CD strategies including Git branching, QA, testing and security
Built and maintained reusable CI/CD pipeline templates for multiple languages and frameworks
Designed CI/CD solutions for big data projects targeting Databricks, Data Factory and Power BI
Implemented infrastructure stacks using Terraform with Bicep POCs
Extensive troubleshooting and optimization across all DevOps operations

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
responsibilities: Created scalable and resilient cloud architectures for multiple enterprise clients
Handled zero-downtime cloud migrations from on-premise infrastructure to AWS and Azure
Managed and monitored Kubernetes and OpenShift clusters in production environments
Orchestrated troubleshooting efforts and disaster recovery strategies in war rooms

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed Android applications for enterprise usage with modern frameworks
Built web applications using Docker, Flask and DirectusCMS architecture

jobs.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: E-commerce web development with focus on performance and scalability
Part-time consulting role providing technical guidance and implementation

jobs.title: DevOps Apprentice
responsibilities: Gained expertise in AWS, serverless architectures and advanced Git workflows
Built CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions under mentorship

items.degree: Master in DevOps and Cloud Computing
highlights: Specialized in cloud architectures and infrastructure automation
Deep dive into DevOps methodologies and SRE practices
Hands-on projects with AWS, Azure and Kubernetes
Focus on CI/CD, monitoring and observability
Comprehensive training in software development and system architectures
Specialization in software engineering and agile methodologies
Final project focused on scalable application development
Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures and programming
